Class UnsupervisedClassifier

java.lang.Object
UnsupervisedClassifier
public class UnsupervisedClassifier
extends java.lang.Object
UnsupervisedClassifier handles the k-means clustering algorithm

    • kMeans

      public static java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,​java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Double[]>> kMeans​(java.lang.String data_path, java.lang.Integer n_clusters)
      This runs the kMeans Clustering algorithm and returns a HashMap of Cluster names and pointts
      Parameters:
      data_path - dataset path
      n_clusters - number of clusters to use
      Returns:
      HashMap with cluster names as keys, points in cluster as values
